data.title: Lawrence Free State High School
data.text:
Don't forget that Wednesday we will be following the Wednesday Assembly Schedule for class meetings. Freshmen and sophomores will go first in the auditorium, followed by juniors and seniors in the main gym. We will give away FS - t-shirts and other cool stuff.

Come to the crossword club this Wednesday after school in room 306. Bring your lunch, and we'll all work on the Sunday Washington Post crossword together. -Luke Roberts. President!

Volleyball has a Jamboree on Thursday at Basehor-Linwood. On Friday, Football travels to Leavenworth for their Jamboree.

Rest up over Labor Day weekend because next week gets crazy....volleyball, soccer, golf, cross-country, football and tennis are all in action! Check the calendar on our website for exact dates. Also, next week, National Honor Society Induction as well as a very helpful ACT Prep Class. Enjoy your week, Free State!

Freshmen - don't forget the Firestarter Dance on Friday night from 7:00 - 9:00 p.m. It is free!

SCHOOL CALENDAR & BELL SCHEDULES

24-25 School Calendar

24-25 Bell Schedule

ATTENDANCE

Parents/guardians should call 785-330-2503 or email fssattendance@usd497.org to let us know when your student is late or absent. If you need your student out for an appointment, please let us know 2 hours in advance.

September 2: Labor Day - no school

September 3: NHS Induction @ 7:30 p.m. in Auditorium

September 3: After School Tutoring Begins in the Library

September 5: ACT Prep Course @ 8:00 a.m. in Room 232

September 18 and 25: Club Fair in the Commons during ECT

Make sure to attend the LPS's College and Career Night at the Lied Center on October 10, 2024

Parents and students can start reviewing colleges and careers and have those conversations with their child early to set goals.

College Fair Flyer

College Night Panel Flyer

Panel Nocturno Universitario

Purchase Free State Gear Link

Click here to be taken to the Free State Store to purchase all your Free State Gear from BSN Sports

2024-2025 ALL SPORTS INFORMATION FOR PARENTS

Schedules and Cancelation Information

www.sunflowerleague.org

Sports Registration - All sports registration is completed online at Aktivate.com and is required prior to participation in any sport, as an athlete. Begin 2024-25 sports registration after June 1, 2024

Forms and Forms Submission: All forms are submitted online at Aktivate.com. Forms may NOT be submitted to the Athletic Office, Main Office, or to the Coaching Staff. Physical and Insurance forms may be downloaded from the athletics website, Aktivate, or picked up at the front office.

NOTE: Per the KSHSAA ~ All athletics forms must be dated May 1 or after the year proceeding the school year for which they are intended. The KSHSAA has released a new revision for the PPE Physical form. Please use the newest version KSHSAA PPE Physical Form_V3.2024

August 7th 5:30-6:30- Free State Sports Information Night

Parents will be invited to gather information for their student-athletes. We will meet at 5:30 in the auditorium, where Athletic Director Jered Shaw will distribute general information regarding being a student-athlete at Free State. Then, specific Fall sports will have breakout sessions at 6 pm.

2024-2025

Fall 2024

Forms Deadline Mon. Aug 12

First day of tryouts/practice Mon. Aug 19

Winter 2024-2025

Forms Deadline Mon. Nov 11

First day of tryouts/practice Mon. Nov 18

Spring 2025

Forms Deadline Mon. Feb 24

First day of tryouts/practice Mar 3
